message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round, let's settle this quickly!
Alice, I'm willing to give you a little more, but I believe a 55/45 split is a fair starting point. Let's see if we can work something out.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.  55/45 is a fair deal considering the time pressure!
